properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 11:37AM CST until January 14 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a Flood Warning
for the following rivers in Mississippi...

Yalobusha At Whaley affecting Carroll and Leflore Counties

The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a

* Flood Warning for
The Yalobusha At Whaley
* from Sunday afternoon to Tuesday morning.
* At 11:00 AM Friday the stage was 19.3 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 21.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river is expected to rise to near flood stage early
Sunday afternoon.
* Flood history...This crest compares to a previous crest of 21.2 feet
on Apr 15 2016.
* Impact...At 21.0 feet...Lowland flooding is occurring near the
river.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive or walk through areas where water covers roadway! The
water may be deeper than it appears. Remember...Turn around, don't
drown!

Please note that forecast crests are based upon rainfall that has
occurred along with forecast rainfall for the next 24 hours.


Additional information is available at:
https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN

The next regularly scheduled update is expected tonight between 8 and
10 PM.
